conversations.body_text:
Good morning

I'm still waiting for your reply.

Hi Goncalo Costa,    We apologize for the delayed response. Your order has already been shipped, and we are unable to make any further changes. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience.    https://www.dhl.com/us-en/home/tracking.html?tracking-id=CE326634919DE  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047115288819

Thank you for your response.

Is it possible for me to return the order when I receive it get a refund
and then re-order the right product?

service@simsonn.com

Hi

I already recieved the package from Germany.
Can you tell me what is coming from China (
https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047115288819) as I don't remeber.

service@simsonn.com
